itemDescription: miscellaneous writer, son of a clergyman, wrote for various encyclopaedias, etc

wikipedia_page.main: Francis Hindes Groome (30 August 1851 – 24 January 1902), son of Robert Hindes Groome, Archdeacon of Suffolk, was a writer and foremost commentator of his time on the Romani people, their language, life, history, customs, beliefs, and lore.
